name: Koko
summary:
Seiichi, a boy who has always lived near a forest in the middle of a small town, grew up hearing stories of monsters and fairies. When the time came to start a new life, he moved to the city, unlucky enough to get lost in one of those areas inhabited by non-human beings. Will he get out of there? Or what decision will he make?

"Her fingers looked like little spider legs on my clothes."
